Name: 100 vacas
About the game: 100 vacas is a bite-sized game about a cowboy recovering his stolen cows and protecting them from bandits and from his own bullets. This tiny game is a collection of quick 1-screen levels. You need to shoot down the bad guys to win, but be careful, you also need to avoid killing the cows to progress to the next stage! This is a challenge You will die, you will learn, you will retry, and you will eventually master the game and earn a well deserved victory. Based on consistent rules The same rules apply for all characters: when you shoot, you can hit enemies as well as your own cattle. When bandits shoot, they can hit you, your cattle, or each other. Who is this game for? You will love 100 vacas if: You love light-hearted small indie games with a cute presentation. You love games that cut on the interruptions and just let you play. You love earning a well deserved victory.
